description.value: A tool to assess the clinical status of the newborn infant immediately after birth and their response to resuscitation.

purpose.value: To record the results for each component parameter and their total sum for the Apgar score.

definition.value: A tool to assess the clinical status of the newborn infant immediately after birth and their response to resuscitation.
@ internal @
Additional information required to extend the model with local content or to align with other reference models or formalisms.
@ internal @
